【考法 1】 n. 昏睡：a state of profound unconsciousness caused by disease, injury, or poison
【例】The girl lay in a coma for three days after the accident.
【近】insensibility, blackout, knockout
【反】consciousness, awareness 有知觉
【考法 2】 n. 迟钝，冷漠： a state of mental or physical sluggishness : torpor
【近】sluggish, torpor
【反】activity, animation 有活力；alacrity 敏捷
【记】 comma “，”逗号代表停顿，思维意识停顿，逗号也象个coma彗星；音：磕懵
